cast.name: 拉塞尔·霍华德 Russell Howard

trans_title: 拉塞尔·霍华德的好新闻 第一季
introduction: Russell Howard returns with the hit show whose debut run was the most requested BBC Three programme on iPlayer in 2009 and the channel's most successful studio-based entertainment show ever.With each episode put together just days before transmission there's no knowing what will feature, but the series will see Russell turn news-junkie once again as he puts his spin on the week's headlines, as well as highlighting some of the more overlooked stories that have caught his eye as he sifts through the papers, news websites and TV news channels.The programme is recorded in front of a live studio audience, but viewers at home will have the chance to shape the news agenda by submitting stories online atwww.bbc.co.uk/russellhoward(where they will also be able to view exclusive extra features) or via Twitter atwww.twitter.com/bbcgoodnews.
chinese_title: 拉塞尔·霍华德的好新闻 第一季
